entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `amount` INTEGER NOT NULL, `categoryId` INTEGER NOT NULL, `date` TEXT NOT NULL, `timestamp` INTEGER NOT NULL, `note` TEXT, FOREIGN KEY(`categoryId`) REFERENCES `categories`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE RESTRICT )

indices.name: index_expenses_date
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_expenses_date` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`date`)

indices.name: index_expenses_categoryId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_expenses_categoryId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`categoryId`)

indices.name: index_expenses_date_categoryId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_expenses_date_categoryId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`date`, `categoryId`)

indices.name: index_expenses_amount
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_expenses_amount` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`amount`)

indices.name: index_expenses_timestamp
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_expenses_timestamp` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`timestamp`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `icon` TEXT NOT NULL, `parentId` INTEGER, `fullPath` TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`parentId`) REFERENCES `categories`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE RESTRICT )

indices.name: index_categories_parentId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_categories_parentId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`parentId`)

indices.name: index_categories_fullPath
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_categories_fullPath` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`fullPath`)

indices.name: index_categories_name_parentId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_categories_name_parentId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`name`, `parentId`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`yearMonth` TEXT NOT NULL, `totalAmount` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`yearMonth`))

contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_expenses_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `expenses` BEGIN DELETE FROM `expenses_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_expenses_fts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `expenses` BEGIN DELETE FROM `expenses_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_expenses_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `expenses` BEGIN INSERT INTO `expenses_fts`(`docid`, `note`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`note`); END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_expenses_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `expenses` BEGIN INSERT INTO `expenses_fts`(`docid`, `note`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`note`); END
entities.createSql: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`note` TEXT, content=`expenses`)

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO room_master_table (id,identity_hash) VALUES(42, '1463ef5036b259a6c090cd00c161086f')
